content: Each line in the tree view has anchor. Can they be referenced from an external link? I know there are issued with getting to it because of the tabs. has anybody done this? Also I am aware that there was discussion on a version change view or tab is this ready for prime time and is there an example?
I don't know anything about a version or change tab discussion
you mean, an external link in some non-ig context?

Not sure if it's exactly what you are referring to, but I've maybe done something similar here?: http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/case-reporting/reportability_response_narrative_guidance.html

image.png

The circled links go to the element - but on the Detailed Descriptions page, not the tree:

image.png

Just included [Relevant reportable condition name](StructureDefinition-rr-relevant-reportable-condition-plandefinition-definitions.html#PlanDefinition.goal.addresses) in the markdown. Was a long and painful manual process! Which I'm just about to update for the new ballot....

If there is a way to link to the tree element, I'd definitely be interested....

but on the Detailed Descriptions page, not the tree:

I was downvoted on pointingto the descriptions when I did that.

I was just checking if I was missing something - This would be nice feature but nothing I'm going to pursue anytime soon
